title: Building Pedagogical Presence-Based Communities for Real-Time Online Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A language education program for current practitioners requiring smartphone-centered learning in environments with limited technological resources

learning_goals: Learners can accurately use 30 language expressions through instructor feedback and interaction in online real-time classes.
Learners can participate in five small-group discussion activities designed by the instructor and engage in collaborative learning with peers.
Learners contribute to the weekly learning community at least three times and provide ten instances of peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
